resources.string: Your crDroid Android ROM installation is almost done! We are a project mainly based on CyanogenMod with many cherry-picks from another great projects as SlimRoms, OmniRom, Paranoid Android, AICP, Dirty Unicorns, Euphoria-OS, Temasek and many others. Our goal is to keep all CM features working with useful codes from pointed projects. You may found a stable and bugless rom. If in any case you find a bug or a weird behavior, please report in our Google Plus community. Proceed with the final steps of your instalation and thank you for install crDroid on your tablet. %s.

Our goal is to keep all CM features working with useful codes from pointed projects. You may found a stable and bugless rom.
